text: Apple Jack is an Xbox Live Indie game developed by British independent developer Tim Sycamore under the name My Owl Software. The game was published in May 2010. It is a 2D puzzle/platform game. The game's plot revolves around Apple Jack rescuing his dogs from kidnappers. ==References== ==External links== *Developer's website *Apple Jack at Xbox.com * Review at Eurogamer.net * Review at DigitalSpy * Review at ArmlessOctopus * Review at gaygame * Review at xnplay Category:2010 video games Category:Microsoft games Category:Xbox 360 Live Indie games Category:Xbox 360-only games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Puzzle-platform games Category:Video games developed in the United Kingdom Category:Single-player video games
title: Apple Jack (video game)
